amendment.description: To require monthly reporting regarding the Disaster Loan Program of the Small Business Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3631 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3631 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S3847-3848; text: CR S3847-3848) To require monthly reporting regarding the Disaster Loan Program of the Small Business Administration.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3631 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3631 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
